name: Forsaken Oathbearer
description:
Glory and promises of treasure deceived you. 
The men with whom you pledged oaths and abandoned your name, a whisper of damnation not even to utter in secret. An unholy pact gave to greater sacrifice - your soul in exchange for foul magic. With the mortal coil severed like an umbilical cord, you are now an abomination.

Forsaken Oathbearer is a class for the MÖRK BORG roleplaying game that holds dark necromantic gifts.

"Forsaken Oathbearer" is an independent production by Ben Gyurik and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License. MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmästare Games and Stockholm Kartell.
